endpoints.description: Fetch current power flow, consumption data, grid voltage, and frequency readings for real-time grid analysis.
Update and adjust dynamic load distribution settings to optimize power flow and prevent overloads across the grid.
Check the integration status and performance monitoring of renewable energy sources in the grid.
Submit detailed reports about detected power outages, for immediate analysis and response planning.
Retrieve a list of all current power outages across the network to evaluate and address issues swiftly.
Access current configurations for anomaly detection alerts, such as thresholds, notification channels, and escalations.
Modify settings for anomaly alerts to improve response times and ensure efficient grid management.
Enroll new smart meters and sensors into the grid monitoring system, enhancing data collection and accuracy.
Obtain historical power consumption data to analyze trends and improve future load predictions.
Securely transmit sensitive grid operation data over the network using robust encryption protocols.
